mapper.insert: INSERT INTO demo.newtransferwater SELECT * from stockmgt.transferwater
mapper.select: SELECT acc_name1 from demo.newtransferwater GROUP BY acc_name1
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT acc_name1 from demo.newtransferwater GROUP BY acc_name1) as num

SELECT id,platformtoken,accountid,TRANDATE,TRANTIME,CRE_TYP,CRE_NO,MESSAGE,AMT,AMT1,FLAG1,ACCNO2,ACC_NAME1,DET, FLAG2,TRANFLOW,BFLOW,DET_NO,RLTV_ACCNO,CADBank_Nm,tran_date,create_date,start from demo.newtransferwater WHERE acc_name1 IN
#{name}
